summary: I OWN A 2002 YAMAHA GRIZZLY 660 ATV.  THERE SEEMS TO BE A TREMENDOUS AMOUNT OF HEAT GENERATED BY THIS MACHINE CAUSING THE FUEL IN THE CARBURETOR TO HEAT UP WHICH THEN CAUSES THE MACHINE TO VAPOR LOCK(SPUTTER, CUT OUT & BACK FIRE) & NOT RUN PROPERLY.  THIS HAS HAPPENED TO MY MACHINE A NUMBER OF TIMES AND MOST RECENTLY ON MARCH 1ST OF 2003. I HAVE BEEN FORTUNATE IN THAT IT HAS NOT HAPPENED AT A CRITICAL TIME DURING RIDING IE. GOING UP AN INCLINE.*JB
